text: All my 4 children started from infant care in My Firstskool. The teachers there are dedicated and passionate about their job, nurturing our children like theirs. I am truly grateful for the support and care given all these years. Keep up the great work and I hope I have more kids for you allðŸ˜…

My boy enrolled to JW2 since 2022.
All the class teachers are very friendly and patient, they will also keep us updated on children health conditions, class behavior or even emotions, so that parents could check and talk with the child.

Surely, I sent my baby girl to JW2 infant care without 2nd thought. The teachers are alwsys caring and love them.

Regarding the K2 graduation ceremony, I felt warmth and so touching to see my boy (introvert) done all the performances without stage fright. From here, you could see that how much efforts and patience from principal, teachers and staffs to guide and encourage them. Last but not least, the decorations on the ceremony such as props, photo booth and the soft toys so nice and memorable to all families!

Thank you very much JW2ðŸ’•

Our experience with MFS JW2 has been outstanding! I enrolled my 2 children in MFS JW2 in 2016 and 2019. First child graduated in 2021, while the second graduated this year. The principals and teachers have always been warm, caring, and deeply committed to the children's development. The learning environment is lively and engaging, making each day an exciting journey for our kids. The curriculum strikes a perfect balance between play and learning, nurturing creativity, social skills, and a love for education. I've seen remarkable growth in my children's confidence and abilities.

I'm especially grateful to the teachers for recognizing signs of selective mutism in my eldest child. Thanks to their attentiveness, he received early intervention at MFS before starting primary school, and he continues to receive support. Additionally, MFS offered targeted help through the FLAiR program for K2 students needing extra support in language and literacy. This helped my child excel, scoring over 90% in his first literacy test during the initial weeks of Primary 1.

Thank you MFS JW2 for being nurturing and supportive environment for my children!

Caring teachers who take the time to create a psychologically safe environment for the students :) Over the years, the programmes also contribute to the development of 21st CC such as being critical thinker through their thematic lessons. Special learning experiences are also curated to allow application of learning to real world context - through learning journeys and special activities like opening a cafe. Thank JW2 for making learning fun and enriching for the kids!
Have my 4 kids studying at this centre. Teacher is nice and helpful. Been working with them for the past 8 years. Thanks for letting me kids have a good study environment
